bibl.title: Ancient Literacies. The Culture of Reading in Greece and Rome
bibl.note: [Introduction.] - 1. Lists of books that have been preserved in papyri. - 2. Concentrations of papyri found together in particular sites. - Pp. 262-264: Appendix. Evidence for the composition of Grenfell and Hunt's "Second great find" of literary papyri [Nos 1-35].
HOUSTON George W., Papyrological Evidence for Book Collections and Libraries in the Roman Empire.
William A. JOHNSON and Holt N. PARKER (Edd.), Ancient Literacies. The Culture of Reading in Greece and Rome (Oxford, 2009) pp. 233-267, 1 pl., 4 tabl.
